tabs.home_description: Welcome to your nutrition dashboard! Here you can view your daily progress, recent meals, and quick access to all features. Use the toolbar to switch languages or get help on any page.
tabs.history_description: Review your past meals and track your eating patterns. Rate your meals, add notes, and learn from your nutrition journey. Use filters to find specific meals or time periods.
tabs.camera_description: Take photos of your meals to automatically log nutrition information. The AI will analyze your food and provide detailed nutritional breakdown. Make sure to capture the entire meal for accurate results.
tabs.profile_description: Manage your personal information, dietary preferences, and app settings. Update your goals, allergies, and notification preferences to customize your experience.
tabs.statistics_description: Track your nutritional progress with detailed charts and metrics. Monitor your intake of macronutrients, micronutrients, and lifestyle factors. Use the time filters to view daily, weekly, or monthly trends.
tabs.calendar_description: Plan your meals for the week ahead. View scheduled meals, track your nutrition goals, and see your eating patterns over time. Tap any date to add or view planned meals.
tabs.devices_description: Connect your fitness trackers and health apps to get a complete picture of your wellness. Sync data from Apple Health, Google Fit, Fitbit, and other supported devices.
tabs.food_scanner_description: Scan barcodes or upload food images to get instant nutrition information. Perfect for packaged foods and restaurant meals. The scanner works best with clear, well-lit images.
tabs.ai_chat_description: Chat with your personal AI nutrition assistant. Ask questions about food, get meal recommendations, and receive personalized advice based on your goals and dietary preferences.
tabs.recommended_menus_description: Discover personalized meal plans created just for you. Based on your dietary preferences, goals, and restrictions, these menus help you maintain a balanced and enjoyable diet.
tabs.welcome_description: Welcome to Calo Health! Your personal nutrition companion that helps you track meals, monitor your health goals, and get personalized nutrition recommendations. Start your journey to a healthier lifestyle today.
tabs.questionnaire_description: Complete your health profile to receive personalized nutrition recommendations. This questionnaire helps us understand your goals, lifestyle, and dietary needs.

devices.google_fit_desc: Connect your Google Fit account to track activities across Android devices
devices.fitbit_desc: Sync your Fitbit tracker data including steps, heart rate, and sleep patterns
devices.garmin_desc: Import detailed fitness metrics from your Garmin watch or device

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy and Data Protection annex is drafted with the assistance of legal counsel and constitutes an integral part of the Terms of Use of the CALO application. This policy establishes the principles of privacy protection, data security, limitations of use, international data transfers, and related legal obligations applicable to the company and its developers in relation to end users.

regulatory_scope.title: Regulatory Scope and Legal Framework
regulatory_scope.content: The App operates under the following regulatory frameworks:

subsections.title: International Compliance
subsections.content: The App operates under the following regulatory frameworks:
items: The European Union General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
The California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA)
Israeli Privacy Protection Law
Any applicable privacy legislation in the user's jurisdiction

subsections.title: GDPR Rights Implementation
subsections.content: In accordance with GDPR, users can exercise the following rights:
items: Right of access to personal data
Right to rectification and erasure (right to be forgotten)
Right to data portability
Right to object and avoid automated decision-making

subsections.title: CCPA Compliance
subsections.content: In compliance with CCPA, users are entitled to:
items: Request full disclosure about the collection and use of their data
Opt-out of data selling
Request deletion and object to processing

sensitive_data.title: Sensitive Information and Health Data
sensitive_data.content: We handle various types of sensitive information with appropriate care and security measures.

subsections.title: Classification of Sensitive Data
subsections.content: The App may process user-provided information that is considered sensitive under privacy law:
items: Nutritional and dietary preferences
Health symptoms or conditions
Lifestyle and biometric indicators
Personal eating habits and patterns

subsections.title: Medical Disclaimer
subsections.content: Important: The Service does not provide:
items: Professional medical advice or diagnosis
Emergency or clinical services
Substitutes for medical consultations by licensed professionals

subsections.title: Data Processing Agreement
subsections.content: We have signed a Data Processing Addendum (DPA) with OpenAI, implementing industry-standard safeguards:
items: SOC 2 Type II compliance
ISO/IEC 27001 and 27701 standards
Audit trails and user data access logs

liability_limitation.title: Limitation of Liability and User Responsibilities
liability_limitation.content: This section outlines the limitations of our liability and your responsibilities as a user of the CALO application.

subsections.title: Service Warranty Disclaimer
subsections.content: The Service is provided 'as-is' and 'as-available' without any express or implied warranty:
items: Data accuracy or completeness
System availability or uninterrupted use
Fitness for a particular purpose

subsections.title: Limitation of Damages
subsections.content: The company shall not be held liable for:
items: Direct, indirect, or consequential damages
Loss of profits or data
Errors, delays, or system failures, except as required by applicable law

subsections.title: User Indemnification
subsections.content: Users agree to indemnify and hold harmless the company against:
items: Any claim arising from misuse of the Service
Violation of these Terms of Use
Infringement of third-party rights or breach of OpenAI's policies

cookies_analytics.title: Cookies and Analytics Tools
cookies_analytics.content: We use various tracking technologies to improve your experience and analyze app performance. You have control over these technologies and can manage your preferences.

data_storage.title: Data Storage, Transfers, and Encryption
data_storage.content: Your personal data may be stored and processed on servers located in Israel, the European Union, and the United States (AWS, Azure). We implement strong encryption both in transit (TLS 1.2+) and at rest (AES-256), along with access control policies, regular backups, and comprehensive security protocols.

user_rights.title: Your Privacy Rights
user_rights.content: You have comprehensive rights regarding your personal data under applicable privacy laws.

subsections.title: Access and Control Rights
items: Access your personal data we hold
Correct inaccurate or incomplete data
Delete your personal data (right to erasure)
Export your data in a portable format
Object to processing of your data

subsections.title: How to Exercise Your Rights
subsections.content: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the information provided in the Contact section. We will respond to your request within 30 days.

contact_info.title: Contact Information
contact_info.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, your data rights, or our privacy practices, please contact our Data Protection Officer at: privacy@calo-app.com. For general inquiries, you can reach us at: support@calo-app.com.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before using Calo Health. By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these terms.

acceptance_of_terms.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance_of_terms.content: By downloading, installing, accessing, or using the Calo Health mobile application, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

description_of_service.title: 2. Description of Service
description_of_service.content: Calo Health is a nutrition tracking and health monitoring mobile application that provides personalized meal planning, nutritional analysis, AI-powered recommendations, and health insights. Our service includes but is not limited to meal logging, calorie tracking, nutritional information, and health goal monitoring.

user_accounts.title: 3. User Accounts and Registration
user_accounts.content: To access certain features of Calo Health, you must create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration and to update such information to keep it accurate, current, and complete.

acceptable_use.title: 4. Acceptable Use Policy
acceptable_use.content: You agree to use Calo Health only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms of Service. You are prohibited from:

subsections.title: Prohibited Activities
subsections.content: The following activities are strictly prohibited:
items: Using the service for any unlawful purpose or to solicit others to perform unlawful acts
Violating any international, federal, provincial, or local regulations, rules, laws, or ordinances
Transmitting or uploading any content that infringes upon another's rights
Transmitting any material that contains viruses, trojan horses, worms, or any other harmful computer code
Interfering with or circumventing security features of the service
Engaging in any automated use of the system without express written consent
Using the service to harass, abuse, insult, harm, defame, slander, disparage, intimidate, or discriminate

subscription_and_payment.title: 5. Subscription and Payment Terms
subscription_and_payment.content: Calo Health offers both free and premium subscription services. Premium features require payment of applicable fees.

subsections.title: Payment Processing
subsections.content: All payments are processed securely through third-party payment processors. By providing payment information, you represent and warrant that you are authorized to use the payment method.
items: Subscription fees are billed in advance on a recurring basis
You authorize us to charge your payment method for all fees incurred
All fees are non-refundable unless otherwise stated
We reserve the right to change subscription fees with 30 days notice

subsections.title: Cancellation Policy
subsections.content: You may cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings. Cancellation will be effective at the end of your current billing period.
items: No refunds will be provided for unused portions of subscription periods
Access to premium features will continue until the end of your current billing cycle
You may reactivate your subscription at any time

intellectual_property.title: 6. Intellectual Property Rights
intellectual_property.content: The Calo Health service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of Calo Health and its licensors. The service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws. Our trademarks and trade dress may not be used in connection with any product or service without our prior written consent.

user_content.title: 7. User Content and Data
user_content.content: You retain ownership of any content you submit, post, or display on or through the service. By submitting content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, and distribute your content in connection with the service.

subsections.title: Content Responsibility
subsections.content: You are solely responsible for your content and the consequences of submitting it. You represent and warrant that:
items: You own or have the necessary rights to use and authorize us to use your content
Your content does not infringe upon the rights of any third party
Your content does not violate any applicable laws or regulations
Your content does not contain any harmful, offensive, or inappropriate material

disclaimers.title: 8. Disclaimers and Health Information
disclaimers.content: Calo Health is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.

subsections.title: Medical Disclaimer
subsections.content: Important health and medical information disclaimers:
items: The information provided is for educational and informational purposes only
Never disregard professional medical advice because of something you have read in the app
If you think you may have a medical emergency, call your doctor immediately
Nutritional information may not be 100% accurate and should be used as estimates only
Individual results may vary and are not guaranteed

subsections.title: Service Availability
subsections.content: We make no warranties regarding service availability or performance:
items: The service is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis
We do not warrant that the service will be uninterrupted or error-free
We reserve the right to modify or discontinue the service at any time
We are not responsible for any data loss or service interruptions

limitation_of_liability.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
limitation_of_liability.content: To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, Calo Health shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues.

subsections.title: Damage Limitations
subsections.content: Our liability is limited in the following ways:
items: We are not liable for any damages resulting from use or inability to use the service
We are not liable for any damages resulting from unauthorized access to your data
Our total liability shall not exceed the amount paid by you in the 12 months preceding the claim
Some jurisdictions do not allow limitation of liability, so these limitations may not apply to you

indemnification.title: 10. Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless Calo Health, its officers, directors, employees, and agents from and against any and all claims, damages, obligations, losses, liabilities, costs, or debt, and expenses (including but not limited to attorney's fees) arising from your use of the service or violation of these terms.

termination.title: 11. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and bar access to the service immediately, without prior notice or liability, under our sole discretion, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms of Service.

subsections.title: Termination Effects
subsections.content: Upon termination, the following will occur:
items: Your right to use the service will cease immediately
We may delete your account and all related data
You will lose access to any premium features or content
Provisions that should survive termination will remain in effect

governing_law.title: 12. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governing_law.content: These Terms of Service shall be interpreted and governed by the laws of Israel, without regard to conflict of law provisions. Any legal action or proceeding arising under these terms will be brought exclusively in the competent courts of Tel Aviv, Israel.

changes_to_terms.title: 13. Changes to Terms of Service
changes_to_terms.content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms of Service at any time. If a revision is material, we will provide at least 30 days notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion. By continuing to access or use our service after any revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms.

contact_information.title: 14. Contact Information
contact_information.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at support@calohealth.com or through the contact information provided in the app. We will respond to your inquiry within a reasonable timeframe.

footer.title: Related Documents
footer.subtitle: Access our other important legal documents and support resources

network.title: Connection Error
network.suggestion: Check your internet connection and try again

timeout.title: Request Timeout
timeout.suggestion: Try again with a clearer image or simplify your request

server.title: Server Error
server.suggestion: Please try again in a few minutes

auth.title: Authentication Error
auth.message: Please sign in again to continue

validation.title: Validation Error
validation.suggestion: Check your input and try again

menuGeneration.title: Menu Generation Failed
menuGeneration.suggestion: Try with different ingredients or simpler descriptions. Ensure ingredients match your dietary preferences (e.g., tuna is not vegetarian).

dietary.title: Dietary Preference Conflict
dietary.suggestion: Check that your selected ingredients match your dietary preferences. For example: fish and tuna are not suitable for vegetarian diets.
